title: Prisma db push executor
description: The db push command pushes the state of your Prisma schema file to the database without using migrations. It creates the database if the database does not exist.

schema.description: Specifies the path to the desired schema.prisma file to be processed instead of the default path. Both absolute and relative paths are supported.

skip-generate.description: Skip generation of artifacts such as Prisma Client.

force-reset.description: Resets the database and then updates the schema - useful if you need to start from scratch due to unexecutable migrations.

accept-data-loss.description: Ignore data loss warnings. This option is required if as a result of making the schema changes, data may be lost.
